body: Disgusting. 8/10

if they just left out that strange ownership thingy and let her live her life, this could have been so sweet and so much better. actually if this and the other work are connected, that would imply she gets to live at least somewhat of a normal life (which is counterindicated in this by him telling her she won't attend the ceremony and by the symbolic collar), so i like to see them as connected.

@malto You don't have to accept it, but the authors words about it being a standalone work is a fact, unless otherwise specified. Though if you really want them to be connected be glad on the fact that dad over here almost got Ntr'd, rather than the other way around.

@Argetuon I will not Accept this >.> The 2 Girls have the Same Age , same Look and same Name these to are connected in  [Okada Kou] Shinsou no (Dare ni mo Ienai Koto)  you can even see the Scars on her Neck  from the collar ( page : 24 , 26 , 27 , 28 ,35,36, 37 38 , 39 an so on >.> and the most important page 44 where she points with a finger on it  ) also  these two are connected , ooh and the Dad message on the phone + when she sucks his finger There is also the Word * Dad *  connenction confirmed
